name: chained-voting
description: Webapplication built on top of Hyperledger Fabric

scripts.install: npm run getbaseimage && npm run govend && docker-compose pull && docker-compose build
scripts.govend: docker-compose run --rm utils bash -c 'cd blockchain/src && GOPATH=$(pwd)/.. govend -rv -i moby' && sudo chown -R $USER blockchain
scripts.gobuild: cd src/main && GOPATH=$(pwd)/../.. && go build chaincode.go
scripts.test-go:
docker-compose run --rm utils bash -c 'cd src/build-chaincode && GOPATH=$(pwd)/../.. go test $(ls -d1 ./*/ | grep -v vendor | tr "
" " " ) ./'
scripts.test-server: docker-compose build server && docker-compose run --rm server bash -c 'npm test'
scripts.test-e2e: docker-compose exec server bash -c 'npm run e2e'
scripts.test: npm -s run test-server && npm -s run test-go
scripts.cf: docker build --tag cf . && docker run -it --rm -v $(pwd)/server/resources:/usr/src/app/server/resources cf

author: IBM GBS DACH Blockchain Task Force
